name: Amwell, Inc.
description: Amwell, Inc. is a leading telehealth platform that connects patients with healthcare providers through a user-friendly, technology-driven interface. Founded in 2015, Amwell is dedicated to improving access to healthcare by making virtual visits as seamless as possible. The platform offers a range of services including urgent care, behavioral health, and chronic condition management, allowing users to receive care from the comfort of their homes. Amwell partners with health systems, insurers, and employers to integrate telehealth into their existing healthcare offerings, ultimately aiming to enhance patient engagement and outcomes. The company leverages advanced technology to provide secure video consultations, enabling real-time communication between patients and healthcare professionals. With a mission to transform the way healthcare is delivered, Amwell is committed to expanding its services and improving healthcare accessibility for all individuals, regardless of location. As telehealth continues to gain traction, particularly in light of recent global health challenges, Amwell is poised to play a critical role in shaping the future of healthcare delivery.

seo.meta_description: Explore Amwell, Inc., a leader in telehealth solutions. Find out how Amwell connects patients to healthcare providers through innovative technology.

faq.question: What services does Amwell provide?
faq.answer: Amwell provides telehealth services including urgent care, behavioral health, and chronic condition management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Amwell?
faq.answer: Ido Schoenberg is the CEO of Amwell, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Amwell headquartered?
faq.answer: Amwell is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: How does Amwell improve healthcare access?
faq.answer: Amwell improves healthcare access by offering virtual consultations that connect patients with healthcare providers remotely.
